label: A3B6C_mP20_14_ae_3e_b-001
title: High Pressure Mn$_{3}$TeO$_{6}$ Double Perovskite Structure
comments:
This is a high pressure phase of Mn$_{3}$TeO$_{6}$, prepared 8\,GPa and 1173\,K.  The data was taken under ambient conditions. 
 The normal state of Mn$_{3}$TeO$_{6}$ is the \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B6C_hR20_148_f_2f_ab-001}{rhombohedral Mg$_{3}$TeO$_{6}$} structure. 
 (Ar\'{e}valo-L\'{o}pez, 2019) give the structure in the $P2_{1}/n$ setting of space group \#14.  We used AFLOW to transform this to the standard $P2_{1}/c$ setting.  This involves a rearrangement of the primitive vectors and shifted the origin from the Te I site to the Mn I site.
